attributes.action: TAKE TOOL THEFT MORE SERIOUS AND INTRODUCE TOUGHER PUNISHMENT FOR THE CRIMINALS
attributes.additional_details: There is no punishment whatsoever and the criminals continue to reoffend time after time because they know they can get away with it
attributes.background:
We want to see harsher punishment for criminals who steal items from hard working tradespeople whether it be from the site or their vehicles.

On a daily occurance tool theft is happening all over the country at a shocking rate and nothing is being done to prevent this and also help the victims

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647047

We have also published the following petitions, which refer to tool theft, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum and maximum penalties for taking a vehicle without consent: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650195

Require registration of goods with serial numbers and checks before sale: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640967
